item.title: Measles cases jump again in South Carolina, rising to more than 550
item.description: Reported measles cases in South Carolina surged by almost 30% in the last few days, state health officials said Friday.

item.title: US flu activity fell for a second week. But experts worry the season is far from over
item.description: The U.S. flu season appears to be waning with two straight weeks of decline in measures of flu activity, according to the latest government data relea...

item.title: Immune-targeting vaccine shows promise intercepting cancer in patients with Lynch Syndrome
item.description: The investigational cancer vaccine, NOUS-209, was found to safely stimulate the immune system to target precancerous and cancerous cells in individual...

item.title: Influence of dog ownership on exercise self-efficacy and physical activity: Differences before and after COVID-19

item.title: Alternative RNA splicing tied to schizophrenia-like behaviors in animal models
item.description: In a new study, Chinese researchers have discovered the previously unrecognized role of alternative splicing of the DOC2A gene in schizophrenia.
